label: KnowledgeBaseModelAnswerSynthesisActivityRecord
description: Represents an LLM answer synthesis activity record.

fields.label: ID
fields.tooltip: The ID of the activity record.

fields.label: Elapsed (ms)
fields.tooltip: The elapsed time in milliseconds for the retrieval activity.

fields.label: Input Tokens
fields.tooltip: The number of input tokens for the LLM answer synthesis activity.

fields.label: Output Tokens
fields.tooltip: The number of output tokens for the LLM answer synthesis activity.

fields.label: Error
fields.tooltip: The error detail explaining why the operation failed.
